data.prayer: God, we pray for the believers in Finström, Åland that they will know how to spend an hour in prayer with you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Finström, Åland

data.prayer: Lord, for the leaders in the state of Finström, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 83 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, help the disciples in the state of Finström to find a person of peace today, like the Philippian jailer, who heard and was immediately baptized with his whole family.
data.verse: And they spoke the word of the Lord to him and to all who were in his house. And he took them the same hour of the night and washed their wounds; and he was baptized at once, he and all his family.

data.prayer: Spirit, defend the church in the state of Finström against being inward-focused.
data.verse: The Spirit of the Sovereign LORD is on me, because the LORD has anointed me to proclaim good news to the poor. He has sent me to bind up the brokenhearted, to proclaim freedom for the captives and release from darkness for the prisoners.

data.prayer: Father, guide the church in Finström, Åland to see their community as a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.

data.prayer: Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the state of Finström.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Father, reveal your kingdom to those with a childlike heart in the state of Finström.
data.verse: At that time, Jesus answered, “I thank you, Father, Lord of heaven and earth, that you hid these things from the wise and understanding, and revealed them to infants. Yes, Father, for so it was well-pleasing in your sight.
